item.description:
Steve Rogers (Chris Evans) is deemed unfit for military duty, until a secret army experiment puts him in top physical condition and turns him into the perfect soldier and athlete. As Captain America, he crosses paths with The Red Skull (Hugo Weaving), an evil scientist working to advance the Nazi agenda over the world!

I hope this movie is good. It's about time Captain America had a good movie. The trailers look terrific. Stanley Tucci and Tommy Lee Jones are in it too.

Captain America opens on July 22. The movie starts at 7:00 PM. Let's meet in the lobby of Showcase Cinema in Worcester at 6:30. If you need to reach me, call my cell phone at 508-981-0455.

Be prepared to stick around for a special closing scene at the end of the credits.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my photo, but with a goatee
item.why: Captain America is an awesome superhero. This movie is set during WWII and directed by Joe Johnston, who also directed the wonderfully nostalgic superhero film The Rocketeer.

group.name: The Worcester Movie Fans Meetup Group

item.name: Captain America: The First Avenger
